package.name: Addedbytes_Duplicatecmspage
package.summary: Adds buttons to your CMS to enable quick duplication of CMS pages and static blocks. Ideal for copying pages or blocks between websites!
package.description:
Content editing can be a laborious affair at the best of times, but none more so than when you are duplicating a page or static block between websites. This simple extension adds a button the the CMS editing system to allow instant duplication of any page or block.

How Do I Use It?

To install the extension:

  • Download the zip, and extract the contents
  • Upload the contents of the httpdocs folder to your website root folder
  • Clear Magento caches
  • Log out and log back in again
  • Edit any CMS page, and you will see a button with the text "Duplicate Page" at the top right, or edit any Static Block and you will see "Duplicate Block" at the top right.

How Do I Get Support?

For technical or sales enquiries, please email our support team.
